label: Customer
peekOfCode:
class Customer(models.Model):
    id = models.AutoField(primary_key=True)
    user_id = models.IntegerField()
    document = models.CharField(max_length=20)
    document_type = models.ForeignKey(DocumentType, on_delete=models.CASCADE)  # Relación con DocumentType
    first_name = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    last_name = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    address = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    phone = models.CharField(max_length=20, blank=True, null=True)
    date_of_birth = models.DateField(blank=True, null=True)

class Product(models.Model):
    id_product = models.AutoField(primary_key=True)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    category = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    brand = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    unit_price = models.DecimalField(max_digits=10, decimal_places=2)
    stock_units = models.IntegerField()
    description = models.TextField(blank=True, null=True)
    id_supplier = models.ForeignKey(Supplier, on_delete=models.SET_NULL, null=True, blank=True, related_name='products')

peekOfCode:
class Supplier(models.Model):
    id_supplier = models.AutoField(primary_key=True)
    id_user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.SET_NULL, null=True, blank=True, related_name='suppliers')
    nit = models.CharField(max_length=20)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    city = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    email = models.EmailField(max_length=50)
    contact_number = models.CharField(max_length=20, blank=True, null=True)
    def __str__(self):
        return self.name
